params._cost: - the number of orgtokens to charge for this item
params._description: - the body text for the item
params._imageUrl: - the s3 bucket url for the item's image
params._infinite: - true if the item should be infinitely purchasable, false otherwise
params._quantity: - number of times the item can be sold (if _infinite == false)
params._title: - the title text for the item

returns._nonce: - the index of the item on-chain

params._nonce: - the index of the item being purchased

returns._balance: - the orgtoken balance of the caller after the purchase

params._nonce: - the index of the item to delist
